title.en: The Self-Radiance of Indestructible Awareness and Emptiness

text.en: You embody the wisdom of all the bliss-gone buddhas and their heirs
text.en-trans: chok chu dü zhi deshek sé ché kyi

text.en: Throughout the ten directions and four times, and keep to the way of non-duality –
text.en-trans: yeshe kur gyur nyimé tsul changwa

text.en: Ever-youthful Mañjuśrī, ‘Gentle Splendour,’ the state of perfect equality:
text.en-trans: jampel zhönnu nyampa nyi kyi ngang

text.en: May we spontaneously perfect the real meaning of non-action!
text.en-trans: char mé dön la lhun gyi drub gyur chik

text.en: With the devotion of viewing the primordial protector and glorious guru
text.en-trans: dö mé gönpo palden lama la

text.en: As the enlightened body of truth, the dharmakāya of perfect equality,
text.en-trans: nyam nyi chökur tawé mögü kyi

text.en: May the inspiration of the ultimate lineage be transferred into our hearts,
text.en-trans: dön gyü gongpé chinlap nying la pö

text.en: And may we gain the great empowerment of the expression of awareness!
text.en-trans: rigpa tsel gyi wangchen tobpar shok

text.en: Primordially present and thus not forged through exertion,
text.en-trans: yé né né chir tsolwé drubpa dang

text.en: It does not depend on capacity or constitution;
text.en-trans: wangpö khyepar sok la mi tö kyang

text.en: As it is so simple, we doubt this mystery of the mind:
text.en-trans: lawé yi ma chepa sem kyi sang

text.en: Let the guru’s instructions give us the strength to see!
text.en-trans: lamé mengak tob kyi tong gyur chik

text.en: Elaboration and analysis are superfluities of thought,
text.en-trans: trö shing chépa kün tok nönma té

text.en: While seeking and cultivating serve only to exhaust.
text.en-trans: tsal zhing drubpa rang nyi ngelwé gyu

text.en: Focusing and meditating are traps that merely bind –
text.en-trans: mik shing gompa shir zhing chingwé zeb

text.en: Let such painful complexity cease within the mind!
text.en-trans: zukngü tröpa nang né chöpar shok

text.en: Beyond thought and expression, there’s nothing that is seen.
text.en-trans: sam jö dral la tongwa gang mé kyang

text.en: Nor is there more to it, something additional, unseen.
text.en-trans: ma tong lhagmar gyurpa gang yang mé

text.en: This is the profound point for the mind to ascertain.
text.en-trans: rang sem kho takchöpa zabmö dön

text.en: May we realize this nature, so hard to point to and make plain!
text.en-trans: tsönpar kawé dé nyi tokpar shok

text.en: Always pure, without complexity, it avoids the eternalist extreme.
text.en-trans: trö kun ka né dak chir yö ta pang

text.en: Rigpa’s radiance is spontaneously present, not a nihilistic void.
text.en-trans: rig dang lhün gyi drubpé mé ta dral

text.en: Although spoken of as two, that’s for ease of comprehension:
text.en-trans: nyi su jö kyang tokpé juk tsul tsam

text.en: May we see the meaning of equality, beyond division and description!
text.en-trans: yermé jö dral nyampé dön tong shok

text.en: Like a finger pointing to the moon,
text.en-trans: di na tsubmö dawa ji zhin du

text.en: Reasoning and words show the way at first.
text.en-trans: dang por yichö tsik gi tsön ché kyang

text.en: But the natural state is no object of thought,
text.en-trans: chö nyi rang bab yichö yul lé dé

text.en: So let us turn within and thereby truly see!
text.en-trans: rang gi rang la len té tongwar shok

text.en: In this, you won't find anything to be removed,
text.en-trans: di la salwar chawa ma tong zhing

text.en: Nor conceive of what could be added or produced.
text.en-trans: zhak té drubpar chawa ma mikpé

text.en: Dharmatā is unstained by efforts to block or cultivate:
text.en-trans: gak drup tsolwé ma lé chönyi ngang

text.en: May we arrive at the state that's spontaneously present!
text.en-trans: lhun gyi népé dön la jukpar shok

text.en: Although we might label aground to be known,
text.en-trans: shé jé zhi dang dröpar chépé lam

text.en: Path to be followed, orfruition to be attained,
text.en-trans: tobja drebü chö su takpa yang

text.en: In the natural state, these are like levels of space:
text.en-trans: rang zhin shi la namkhé gorim dra

text.en: Effortlessly, then, may we keep to true non-action!
text.en-trans: char mé dön la lhun gyi népar shok

text.en: Impure saṃsāric phenomena, conceived in delusion,
text.en-trans: trulwé dro tak ma dak khorwé chö

text.en: And their opposites too, labelled ‘pure appearance’,
text.en-trans: dé lé lokpa dakpé nangwa yang

text.en: Are dependent designations, elaborate projections:
text.en-trans: tö né takpa nampar tröpé chö

text.en: May we see their absence in the unelaborate condition!
text.en-trans: trömé shi la mi né tong gyur chik

text.en: The actual nature as it is, beyond the ordinary mind,
text.en-trans: lo dral chö nyi shi kyi zhuk tsul la

text.en: Is obscured by tainted notions of view and meditation.
text.en-trans: ta dang gompé lé kyi tokpé drip

text.en: In true ordinariness there is neither theory nor practice:
text.en-trans: tamal shi su sön la ta gom dral

text.en: May we naturally remain in the genuine condition!
text.en-trans: nalmé dön la bab kyi né gyur chik

text.en: To focus on anything only poisons the view,
text.en-trans: gang la mikpar chawa tawé duk

text.en: Deliberate fixation is but a meditative flaw,
text.en-trans: gang zhik tsolwé zinpa gompé kyön

text.en: Adopting and avoiding are perilous to action:
text.en-trans: gang la langdor chawa chöpé trang

text.en: May we see the nature beyond such affliction!
text.en-trans: zukngu kun dral chö nyi tongwar shok

text.en: Directly seeing what transcends the ordinary mind:
text.en-trans: tröpé zeb tu ma tsü rigpé dang

text.en: Rigpa’s radiance that’s not conceptually confined,
text.en-trans: lo dral ngönsum tong la yichö kyi

text.en: Without binding the sky in the rope of conjecture,
text.en-trans: zhakpé kha la düpa mi dorwar

text.en: Let us master the genuine state of natural rest!
text.en-trans: rangzhak nalmé dön la khé gyur chik

text.en: The Gentle Voiced — Mañjughoṣa — of natural luminosity
text.en-trans: dé tsé rang rig zhön nu bumpa kü

text.en: Is the cognizance of self-awareness, the youthful vase body:
text.en-trans: khyen cha rang ösalwa jampé yang

text.en: May the brilliant lamp of naturally arisen insight
text.en-trans: sherab rang jung drönmé nangwa yi

text.en: Banish the dense darkness of mind’s obscurations!
text.en-trans: dribpé münpa tibpo jom gyur chik

text.en: In the nature, which is uncompounded and uncontrived,
text.en-trans: ma chö dü ma chépé chönyi la

text.en: Nothing can be generated anew through fabricated paths,
text.en-trans: chömé lam gyi sar du drup mépé

text.en: Which is why the ultimate fruit does not arise from a cause.
text.en-trans: gyu lé ma jung tartuk drébüi dön

text.en: May we come to see what is, and always has been, within!
text.en-trans: rang la yé né nepa tongwar shok

text.en: Husk-like words of speculative ideas lead only to delusion:
text.en-trans: yichö tsik gi punpa trulwé lam

text.en: However they’re expressed, they entangle us in thought.
text.en-trans: jitar jö kyang tokpé drawa té

text.en: Let us practise instead the heart’s profound instructions,
text.en-trans: lung lé ma jung rang gi rig chawé

text.en: Which arise not from scripture, but are intuitively known!
text.en-trans: mengak zabmo nying la gompar shok

text.en: The mind of perceiver and perceived is essentially deluded.
text.en-trans: zung dzin sem ni ngowo nyi kyi trul

text.en: No matter what its focus, it never accords with how things are.
text.en-trans: gang tar mikpa dé zhin nyi du min

text.en: May we attain the buddhahood of definitive reality –
text.en-trans: sem lé ma jung rangjung yeshé ku

text.en: The natural wisdom-kāya that does not derive from mind!
text.en-trans: ngepa dön gyi sangyé drubpar shok

text.en: Within the all-pervading space of rigpa, empty and aware,
text.en-trans: rigtong rigpé ying su chö tamché

text.en: All things are equal, and, in this single, perfect sphere,
text.en-trans: nyampa nyi gyur tiklé nyak chik la

text.en: There are no longings or fears for saṃsāra or nirvāṇa:
text.en-trans: khordé ré dok zhikpé ngang tsul du

text.en: May we capture this stronghold of unlocated dharmakāya!
text.en-trans: mi né chökü tensi zinpar shok

text.en: Whatever we perceive, as the body or as objects of the senses,
text.en-trans: di tar lü dang yul du nangwa yang

text.en: Is like defective vision, apparent through the force of thought alone —
text.en-trans: rab rib zhin du tokpé wang gi nang

text.en: By means of the natural radiance of great, non-conceptual wisdom,
text.en-trans: mi tok yeshé chenpö rang dang kyi

text.en: May all be purified into the original space of phenomenal exhaustion!
text.en-trans: chö zé dömé ying su jang gyur chik

text.en: At that time, may we gain the ultimate, unobstructed fruition,
text.en-trans: dé tsé kha dang nyampé yeshé ku

text.en: And, with a wisdom buddha-form as vast and limitless as the sky,
text.en-trans: chok dü muta si du dro kun gyi

text.en: Become wish-granting jewels, providing benefit and happiness
text.en-trans: pendé dön kun jowé yizhin nor

text.en: To beings everywhere, throughout the whole infinity of space and time!
text.en-trans: dripdral drébü tartuk tobpar shok

text.en: ‘Merely hearing this is sure to bring liberation’ —
text.en-trans: töpa tsam gyi ngepar drol gyur zhé

text.en: Thus, Vajradhara praised the supreme of paths.
text.en-trans: dorje chang gi ngakpa lam gyi chok

text.en: What need is there to mention holding it in mind?
text.en-trans: di tsul sempar chépa mö chi tsal

text.en: May the truth of dharmatā swiftly bring liberation!
text.en-trans: chönyi denpé nyur du drolwar gyur

text.en: ‘When it’s difficult for students to follow effort-based vehicles,
text.en-trans: tsol ché tekpé dulwar kawé tsé

text.en: The teachings of Samantabhadra’s wisdom-mind will arise’—
text.en-trans: kunzang tuk kyi tenpa jung zhé su

text.en: May these essential teachings, praised in such statements,
text.en-trans: ngakpé lung zhing nyingpö tenpa yi

text.en: Pervade the whole universe, spreading everywhere, far and wide!
text.en-trans: jikten kuntu khyab ching gyé gyur chik
